selections.name: Bad Alibi
selections.reason: Consistent performer knocking on the door. Just missed last start (2nd by 0.2L) with a strong rating of 55. Maps to settle handy.

selections.name: Rushonova
selections.reason: Excellent debut run finishing 2nd. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2 to utilize the +8m rail bias. Trinder stable improver.

selections.name: Mcveigh
selections.reason: First starter from the Trinder yard. Won a trial impressively. 'Unexposed Elite' profile.

selections.name: Who's In Dev
selections.reason: Resuming. Trial winner leading in. Previous form is competitive for this grade.

danger_horse.name: Rushonova
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced improver with the best barrier draw on a rail-biased track.

selections.name: Monclere
selections.reason: Standout on ratings (56). Consistent performer in better races than this. Should have too much class for a weak field.

selections.name: Seditious Award
selections.reason: Solid 4th at Hobart last start. Ratings profile (46) puts her clearly second best here.

selections.name: Alpine Whiskey
selections.reason: Drawn the inside gate. Form is average but the rail bias brings him into place contention.

selections.name: Nataldi
selections.reason: Can improve on recent form in this very weak maiden.

selections.name: Opensea
selections.reason: Drop in class from BM64 where he rated 60. Failed at 2100m last start, mile suits perfectly. Drawn barrier 3 to sit on speed.

selections.name: Vortistar
selections.reason: Last start winner with a high rating (62). Progressive type who can handle the step up in grade.

selections.name: Thickskinned
selections.reason: Broke maiden status last start. tough gelding who maps well.

selections.name: Sir Jag
selections.reason: Consistent in this grade (Ratings 52-55). Barrier 15 is a major negative but has the ability.

danger_horse.name: Vortistar
danger_horse.reason: Recent winner with the highest last-start rating in the field.

selections.name: Geegees Legacy
selections.reason: Won a BM60 two starts back. Consistent ratings (57). Maps to be competitive.

selections.name: Zoete's Rock
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Proven at this level. Solid contender.

selections.name: Street Diva
selections.reason: Resuming. Has class on her side and drawn barrier 3 to exploit the rail. Watch betting.

selections.name: Nazorian
selections.reason: Consistent type. Rarely far away. Good place chance.

danger_horse.name: Zoete's Rock
danger_horse.reason: In good form and rates highly.
